Description

Astropy’s test helper (inside astropy.tests) is very useful. There are some packages that do not want to use astropy-helpers submodule nor Astropy’s package template, but could use its test helper very much. It seems natural to extract the test helper into a new package on its own, so any developer can take advantage of its extra pytest features (e.g., remote data, doctest, etc). Currently, the test helper uses other utility functions from astropy.utils and Astropy logging. Ideally, this new package would be a complete standalone. This project would be to explore ways to re-package Astropy test helper as a standalone package that is not dependent on Astropy, and make it happen.
